title: Riesgo Cardiovascular App
description:
Application to know your cardiovascular risk.

With this application you will be able to know what level of risk you have of developing a cardiovascular disease, I calculate that we carry out taking into account your habits, biological factors and symptoms that you present.

You will be able to know the level of risk in which you are in less than 3 minutes, since you will only have to register and then you will answer some questions that will be presented to you in the application. Upon completion, you will immediately get the result.

🌟Special Features:

⭐ We calculate cardiovascular risk based on the system recommended by the WHO/ISH
⭐ Once registered, it will take less than 3 minutes to answer the questions and receive your result.
⭐You can receive notifications to remember to calculate your risk every month.
⭐ You can see all your previous results, along with graphs so you can measure your progress in reducing your risk.
⭐ You will find several tips to reduce your cardiovascular risk.
⭐ We not only calculate your cardiovascular risk, we also calculate your Body Mass Index, your risk of developing diabetes and if there are signs that you have cardiovascular disease developing.
